Package triple.com

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
triple.com.Admin
public class Admin extends Object
The Admin class is responsible for managing administrative operations, including user login, client management, program tracking, instructor management, and article approval/rejection.

It requires the admin to be logged in to perform most actions.

    • getLogin

      public boolean getLogin()
      Returns whether the admin is logged in.
      Returns:
      true if the admin is logged in, false otherwise

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the admin, marking the admin as not logged in.

    • login

      public void login(String userName, String password)
      Logs in the admin with a given username and password. Only "admin" username and password will grant access.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username for login
      password - the password for login

    • createClientAccount

      public Client createClientAccount(String name, String password)
      Creates a new client account if the admin is logged in.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the client
      password - the password for the client account
      Returns:
      the created Client object, or null if the admin is not logged in

    • seeStatistics

      public ArrayList<Program> seeStatistics()
      Retrieves statistics of popular programs, if the admin is logged in.
      Returns:
      a list of popular programs or null if the admin is not logged in

    • updateClient

      public Client updateClient(String clientId, String updatedName, String updatedPassword)
      Updates the details of a client based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      clientId - the ID of the client to update
      updatedName - the new name of the client
      updatedPassword - the new password of the client
      Returns:
      the updated Client object, or null if no client found with the given ID

    • deactivateClient

      public void deactivateClient(String clientId)
